summary: An Ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 6547, entitled "An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Third Avenue South from the south margin of Yesler Way to north margin of Jackson Street, in the City of Seattle, by replanking the same between curbs, said curbs to be uniformly twenty-one (21) feet from the center line of said Third Avenue South, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Immediate Payment," under the provisions of Ordinance No. 5693, of said city, approved December 6, 1899.
